tool_description: Calculates exact stitch and row counts needed for specific dimensions based on gauge measurements and design specifications.
error_messages: Dimension out of range: target_width must be 1-60 inches, target_height must be 1-80 inches.
Invalid gauge measurements: stitches_per_inch must be 1-12, rows_per_inch must be 1-15.
Stitch multiple out of range: Must be between 2 and 50, or use 1 for no pattern repeat requirement.
usage: Input target dimensions and gauge measurements. Optionally specify stitch_multiple if pattern requires specific stitch count multiples.

cast_on_stitches.description: Number of stitches to cast on

total_rows.description: Total number of rows to knit

actual_width.description: Actual width based on calculated stitches

actual_height.description: Actual height based on calculated rows

adjustment_notes.description: Notes about adjustments made for pattern multiples
